name: scramblify
description: A CLI that encrypts and decrypts png, jpg, jpeg images to a gibberish image and provides you the key to unlock it later so that you have the complete control of your images.

description: My poprtfolio website built with Next.js and ShadcnUI. Displays My Projects and Work Experience

description: An open-source Typescript library designed to simplify the process of calculating Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) 3.0 scores

name: bigints
description: A small package to do big things with big numbers

name: project-euler
description: Solutions to Project Euler problems in JavaScript https://projecteuler.net/archives

name: CIS_Scripts
description: Automated scripts for auditing and enforcing CIS v3.0.0 benchmarks on Windows 11 (Basic and Enterprise editions) and Linux systems. These scripts are designed to simplify cybersecurity compliance by providing modular, customizable, and error-handling capabilities, with detailed logging and reporting for robust IT infrastructure security.

name: logrivet
description: LogRivet: Lightweight TypeScript logging utility with customizable formatting and file storage.

name: SSH_Bruteforce
description: 🔒 A script attempting to guess SSH passwords on a target IP using a provided list, Use strong passwords, limit login attempts, firewall, public key auth, keep software updated and monitor logs for prevention 🛡️.

name: JWT_Authentication
description: 🔒 Secure JWT Authentication demo project with React and Express.js for your web app, just clone the repo and update the environment variables with JWT secret key to run🚀.

name: Keylogger
description: This is a demonstration script for educational purposes. 📝 A simple Node.js keylogger that captures keystrokes and sends them to a specified email address every 24 hours. 🔒 Use at your own risk!

name: ZIP-Cracker
description: ! 🔑 Attempt to crack zip files with this script using the jszip package and a list of potential passwords 🔒 Protect yourself with strong and unique passwords, encryption, two-factor authentication and keeping software updated 🕵️‍♂️ Monitor logs to detect and prevent any suspicious activity.

name: TCP-Scanner
description: 🔎 Discover open ports with this powerful port scanner script using Python 🛡️ Protect yourself with firewall, disabling unnecessary services, keeping software updated and monitoring logs 🕵️‍♂️ Use an Intrusion detection system (IDS) for real-time protection.

name: Network-Sniffer
description: 📡 Sniffing out sensitive information with this packet sniffer script using Scapy in Python 🔒 Protect yourself with encryption, VPN, firewall and avoid public Wi-Fi 🛡️ Keep your software updated to prevent vulnerabilities

name: Network-Scanner
description: 🔍 A simple command-line tool to discover devices on a network by sending ARP packets and analyzing the responses. 💻 Educational and testing purposes only. Use at your own risk.

name: ARP-Spoofer
description: 🔧 A command-line tool to perform ARP spoofing on a network. 🚫 Use for educational and testing purposes only. Use at your own risk.

name: Mac-Changer
description: 🔧 A simple command-line tool to change the MAC address of a network interface on your system. 💻 Educational and testing purposes only. Use at your own risk.

name: PasswordCrack
description: This is a demonstration script for educational purposes. 📝 A simple Node.js keylogger that captures keystrokes and sends them to a specified email address every 24 hours. 🔒 Use at your own risk!
